nodes.text: Razoronns were non-sentient predators native to the planet Ord Mantell. They were one of the few carnivore species that could take down a Gapillian grazer by itself. They never got too near to Ord Mantell settlements, wandering the planet's beaches and meadows in search for preys; if not teased, they did not attack humans who came near them, but they could present a serious threat to anything smaller than an armored shuttlecraft if enraged.
